enabled.description: Set to false to disable tooltips.

container.description: The element to place the tooltip into. This can be used to confine the tooltip to a specific area which may be outside of the sparkline grid cell.

renderer.description: A callback function used to create the content for the tooltips. This function should return an object or a HTML string used to render the tooltip.

enabled?.description: Whether or not to show the tooltip for a specific data point when hovered over.

content?.description: The string that will be displayed in the content div.

title?.description: Title of the tooltip, this string will be displayed in the title div.

color?.description: The CSS color value for the tooltip text.

backgroundColor?.description: The CSS color value for the tooltip title background.

opacity?.description: The vlaue in the range of 0 to 1 for the opacity of the background of the tooltip title div.
